title: Stock of Pixel 4A on Flipkart in India
content:
I am eagerly waiting for the Pixel 4A to come in stock of Flipkart from last month but still i am waiting without having any information of its stock, i had contacted google UK they couldn't help, i had contacted Flipkart India there executives are just saying to press "Notify me" button and wait for the stock. I waiting from last 30-40 days but still i don't have any information or option to purchase a google pixel 4a device. I am helpless here and i think i will have to drop my plan to have my Pixel 4A in India even if it's launched here. 
I have mailed Flipkart India, Redington India as it's the importer but still i have got no help, this is my last hope as i was really excited to have my Pixel 4A which was available in India but i dont know what flipkart is doing. Please help AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.
